description.translate: A footprint for which no soil can resist, not even rock.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Marque-terre\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Une emprunte pour laquelle aucun\"}","{\"text\":\"§7sol ne résiste, pas même la roche.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7A footprint for which no soil\"}","{\"text\":\"§7can resist, not even rock.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a4 §7HER§c-1\"}"]}}
